name: Sortico (Work In Progress)
description:
A game about figuring out how to file arbitrary objects into arbitrary folders, and then having to remember how you filed things. 

THIS GAME IS UNFINISHED, I still need to add:

- Settings

- Music

- Sounds

- a Credits page

Also, I don't actually know if this game is fun. I just liked the idea of being in control of the sorting system.

I started working on this game half a year ago, but then had to return to Uni and so it has been on the back burner for a while. But I got a bit of time to get it mostly playable, and figured I should release it as a prototype.

All art and programming is made by me!
